title: Fort Vancouver National Historic Site: Forge & Plane
body: The Forge and Plane       The Forge & Plane is the official newsletter of the Fort Vancouver Trades Guild. The goal of the newsletter is to keep guild members informed of the goings-on at the fort, techniques of the historic smiths and carpenters, and news of fellow guild members.
